Description.Name: AES-MS-MT3620
MainCoreHeaderFileTopContent: /* Copyright (c) Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.
// This header lists the available peripherals for the Avnet AES-MS-MT3620
// and provides the header definition and application manifest values required to use them.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_AESMS_PIN5_GPIO0
Peripherals.Comment: AES-MS-MT3620 pin 5 exposes GPIO 0.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_AESMS_PIN6_GPIO1
Peripherals.Comment: AES-MS-MT3620 pin 6 exposes GPIO 1.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_AESMS_PIN7_GPIO2
Peripherals.Comment: AES-MS-MT3620 pin 7 exposes GPIO 2.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_AESMS_PIN8_GPIO4
Peripherals.Comment: AES-MS-MT3620 pin 8 exposes GPIO 4.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_AESMS_PIN9_GPIO5
Peripherals.Comment: AES-MS-MT3620 pin 9 exposes GPIO 5.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_AESMS_PIN10_GPIO6
Peripherals.Comment: AES-MS-MT3620 pin 10 exposes GPIO 6.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_AESMS_PIN11_GPIO8
Peripherals.Comment: AES-MS-MT3620 pin 11 exposes GPIO 8.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_AESMS_PIN12_GPIO9
Peripherals.Comment: AES-MS-MT3620 pin 12 exposes GPIO 9.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_AESMS_PIN13_GPIO10
Peripherals.Comment: AES-MS-MT3620 pin 13 exposes GPIO 10.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_AESMS_PIN14_GPIO12
Peripherals.Comment: AES-MS-MT3620 pin 14 exposes GPIO 12.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_AESMS_PIN15_GPIO13
Peripherals.Comment: AES-MS-MT3620 pin 15 exposes GPIO 13.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_AESMS_PIN16_GPIO16
Peripherals.Comment: AES-MS-MT3620 pin 16 exposes GPIO 16.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_AESMS_PIN17_GPIO17
Peripherals.Comment: AES-MS-MT3620 pin 17 exposes GPIO 17.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_AESMS_PIN18_GPIO26
Peripherals.Comment: AES-MS-MT3620 pin 18 exposes GPIO 26. Pin shared with SPI0 and UART0.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_AESMS_PIN19_GPIO27
Peripherals.Comment: AES-MS-MT3620 pin 19 exposes GPIO 27. Pin shared with ISU0.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_AESMS_PIN20_GPIO28
Peripherals.Comment: AES-MS-MT3620 pin 20 exposes GPIO 28. Pin shared with ISU0.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_AESMS_PIN21_GPIO29
Peripherals.Comment: AES-MS-MT3620 pin 21 exposes GPIO 29. Pin shared with UART0 and SPI0.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_AESMS_PIN22_GPIO31
Peripherals.Comment: AES-MS-MT3620 pin 22 exposes GPIO 31. Pin shared with SPI1 and UART1.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_AESMS_PIN23_GPIO32
Peripherals.Comment: AES-MS-MT3620 pin 23 exposes GPIO 32. Pin shared with ISU1.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_AESMS_PIN24_GPIO33
Peripherals.Comment: AES-MS-MT3620 pin 24 exposes GPIO 33. Pin shared with ISU1.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_AESMS_PIN25_GPIO34
Peripherals.Comment: AES-MS-MT3620 pin 25 exposes GPIO 34. Pin shared with SPI1 and UART1.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_AESMS_PIN26_GPIO35
Peripherals.Comment: AES-MS-MT3620 pin 26 exposes GPIO 35. Pin shared with SPI1.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_AESMS_PIN27_GPIO37
Peripherals.Comment: AES-MS-MT3620 pin 27 exposes GPIO 37. Pin shared with I2C2.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_AESMS_PIN28_GPIO38
Peripherals.Comment: AES-MS-MT3620 pin 28 exposes GPIO 38. Pin shared with I2C2.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_AESMS_PIN29_GPIO41
Peripherals.Comment: AES-MS-MT3620 pin 29 exposes GPIO 41.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_AESMS_PIN30_GPIO42
Peripherals.Comment: AES-MS-MT3620 pin 30 exposes GPIO 42.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_AESMS_PIN31_GPIO43
Peripherals.Comment: AES-MS-MT3620 pin 31 exposes GPIO 43.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_AESMS_ISU0_UART
Peripherals.Comment: AES-MS-MT3620 ISU 0 configured as UART, pin 20 (RX), pin 18 (TX), pin 21 (CTS), pin 19 (RTS).

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_AESMS_ISU0_SPI
Peripherals.Comment: AES-MS-MT3620 ISU 0 configured as SPI, pin 20 (MISO), pin 18 (SCLK), pin 21 (CSA), pin 19 (MOSI).

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_AESMS_ISU0_I2C
Peripherals.Comment: AES-MS-MT3620 ISU 0 configured as I2C,  pin 20 (SDA) and pin 18 (SCL).

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_AESMS_ISU1_UART
Peripherals.Comment: AES-MS-MT3620 ISU 1 configured as UART, pin 24 (RX), pin 22 (TX), pin 25 (CTS), pin 23 (RTS).

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_AESMS_ISU1_SPI
Peripherals.Comment: AES-MS-MT3620 ISU 1 configured as SPI, pin 24 (MISO), pin 22 (SCLK), pin 25 (CSA), pin 23 (MOSI) and pin 26 (CSB).

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_AESMS_ISU1_I2C
Peripherals.Comment: AES-MS-MT3620 ISU 1 configured as I2C,  pin 24 (SDA) and pin 23 (SCL).

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_AESMS_ISU2_I2C
Peripherals.Comment: AES-MS-MT3620 ISU 2 configured as I2C,  pin 28 (SDA) and pin 27 (SCL).
